    • Method Detail

      • calculateMagicConstant

        public long calculateMagicConstant()
        This function calculates the magic constant of the magic square depending of the size.
        Returns:
        A long number representing the magic constant.

      • calculatePos

        public int[] calculatePos(int m,
                          int n)
        This function calculates the positions of the numbers in the gridpane that have to be highlighted with another color.
        Pre: The magic square matrix has been initialized.
        Parameters:
        m - The row that has to be highlighted.
        n - The column that has to be highlighted.
        Returns:
        An array of integer numbers representing the indexes of the gridpane that have to be highlighted.

      • calculateStarts

        public void calculateStarts()
        This function calculates the value of the start row and the start column depending on the starting position.
        Post: The startRow and startColumn attributes have been initialized.

      • solve

        public int[] solve()
        This function fills the magic square depending on the orientation and starting position of the algorithm.
        Returns:
        An array of integers representing the values of the gridpane that have to be filled with their respective number.
        Post: The magic square matrix has been filled.

      • northEastern

        public void northEastern(int[] values)
        Function which fills the algorithm in the north eastern orientation.
        Parameters:
        values - The array of integers that is going to be filled to have the values of the gridpane.

      • northWestern

        public void northWestern(int[] values)
        Function which fills the algorithm in the north western orientation.
        Parameters:
        values - The array of integers that is going to be filled to have the values of the gridpane.

      • setSize

        public void setOrientation(java.lang.String orientation)

        Post: There is a new orientation for the fill algorithm now.
        Parameters:
        orientation - The new orientation of the algorithm.
